Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Evangelist:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te piparyenoc n~euaggelict/ic Iwann/c pia~poctoloc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of the celibate Evangelist, John the Apostle, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بصلوات البتول الإنجيلى يوحنا الرسول، يارب أنعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا
